ðŸ“¦ AvanceradBioinformatikPackage

AvanceradBioinformatikPackage provides tools and workflows for data preprocessing and analysis as part of the Advanced Bioinformatics course at UmeÃ¥ University. The main purpose if this package is on identifying optimal spacer sequences for gene knockout using CRISPR-Cas9.

ðŸš€ Installation and example usage

To install the development version of the package from GitHub:

# If not already installed devtools, run:
install.packages("devtools") 

# Install the package
devtools::install_github("Sladderdask/AvanceradBioinformatikPackage")
#example usage
library(AvanceradbioinformatikPackage)

result <- fun(5)
print(result)
